title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Grilled chicken chunks in a buttery, creamy tomato gravy.

title: Avocado Toast Deluxe
summary: Sourdough toast with smashed avocado, chili flakes, and a soft-boiled egg.

title: Beef Stir Fry
summary: Quick wok-fried beef with colorful veggies in a savory soy-ginger sauce.

title: Blueberry Pancakes
summary: Fluffy pancakes loaded with blueberries and drizzled with maple syrup.

title: Greek Salad
summary: Crisp cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, and feta with lemon-oregano dressing.
